title: No results if searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: No results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The search should display the expected results when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view 
2. Select a package from the view 
3. Open the search dialog 
4. Enter a search term 
5. Click the search button 
6. Verify if any results are displayed 

Expected behavior: The search should display the expected results based on the search term.
